resources.string: Sale And Rent
Welcome
Lake View House

This spacious house offers breathtaking views of the lake, making it perfect for family gatherings and nature lovers. It features an open floor plan, a modern kitchen, cozy bedrooms, and a spacious living area where you can enjoy sunset views.
Spacious house with lake views, ideal for family outings.

3 bedrooms (master with en-suite), 2 bathrooms, 150 m², lake access, large garden with patio, fireplace, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, energy-efficient windows, private boat dock.
Modern Cottage

This eco-friendly modern cottage boasts an open layout with large windows that flood the space with natural light. It includes a cozy terrace for outdoor relaxation and entertaining, along with a stylish kitchen and living room designed for comfort.
Modern cottage with an open layout and large windows.

4 bedrooms (including guest suite), 3 bathrooms, 200 m², eco-friendly materials, large terrace with seating area, spacious living room with fireplace, gourmet kitchen with island, energy-efficient appliances, landscaped garden.
Rustic Country House

A charming rustic country house surrounded by lush fields and forests. This home features a traditional fireplace and a spacious garden, making it perfect for those seeking peace and tranquility. It has cozy bedrooms and a kitchen with a dining area for family meals.
Charming rustic country house with a fireplace and garden.

2 bedrooms (including a loft), 1 bathroom, 100 m², expansive garden, traditional wood-burning fireplace, country-style kitchen with rustic cabinetry, wrap-around porch, proximity to hiking trails, pet-friendly.
Eco-Friendly Home

This eco-friendly home features solar panels and energy-efficient technologies. Inside, you’ll find a spacious open plan design, a large kitchen, and comfortable bedrooms, perfect for modern living. The outdoor space includes a garden with fruit trees and ornamental plants.
Eco-friendly home with solar panels and energy-efficient design.

3 bedrooms (including a master suite), 2 bathrooms, 180 m², solar panels, energy-efficient appliances, large garden with fruit trees, rainwater harvesting system, open-concept living area, home office space.
Summer Cottage

This small summer cottage is located in a picturesque area, ideal for a nature getaway. It features an open porch perfect for barbecues and a cozy interior, making it a great spot for short vacations and peaceful weekends away from the city.
Small summer cottage, perfect for nature retreats.

1 bedroom (with bunk beds), 1 bathroom, 50 m², open porch with barbecue grill, fully equipped kitchenette, cozy living area, proximity to hiking trails, outdoor fire pit, great for family and friends.
Luxury Mansion

This luxurious mansion features a swimming pool and a private gym, offering all the comforts for modern living. With spacious rooms, high ceilings, and stylish decor, this home is perfect for those who appreciate luxury and comfort. A large terrace provides a perfect spot for sunny days.
Luxury mansion with a swimming pool and gym.

5 bedrooms (including a master suite with walk-in closet), 4 bathrooms, 350 m², heated swimming pool, home gym, cinema room, gourmet kitchen with high-end appliances, expansive terrace with outdoor kitchen, landscaped garden with water features.
Classic House

A classic house with a majestic façade and a cozy ambiance. This home features traditional architecture combined with modern amenities, including a stylish kitchen and spacious rooms. The surrounding garden creates a serene atmosphere for relaxation.
Classic house with a majestic façade and cozy ambiance.

4 bedrooms (including a guest room), 3 bathrooms, 220 m², traditional architecture with modern upgrades, large garden with mature trees, open-concept kitchen and dining area, hardwood floors throughout, fireplace in the living room.
House with Terrace

This house features a large terrace and garden, perfect for family dinners and outdoor gatherings. Inside, you’ll find bright and cozy rooms that create a warm atmosphere. It’s an excellent place for relaxation and outdoor entertainment.
House with a large terrace and garden for family gatherings.

3 bedrooms (including a master suite), 2 bathrooms, 160 m², expansive terrace with outdoor dining, landscaped garden with flower beds, modern kitchen with island, spacious living room, close to parks and amenities.
Minimalist House

A minimalist house with a simple and stylish design. It offers open spaces where every element is thoughtfully designed. Ideal for individuals who appreciate simplicity and functionality in their living environment.
Stylish minimalist house with open spaces.
2 bedrooms (one convertible), 1 bathroom, 80 m², open floor plan, modern design with clean lines, energy-efficient windows, small garden area, perfect for urban living.
Cottage by the Forest

A cozy cottage located near the forest, perfect for weekend getaways. This home offers all the comforts of modern living, with a spacious kitchen and inviting rooms. A great place for outdoor activities and enjoying nature.
Cozy cottage near the forest, ideal for weekend getaways.
2 bedrooms (including a loft), 1 bathroom, 70 m², rustic charm with modern amenities, large deck for outdoor lounging, fully equipped kitchen, hiking trails nearby, pet-friendly.
Nature Harmony Home

This home is surrounded by nature, featuring a large garden and a pond, allowing you to enjoy peace and the beauty of the outdoors. Spacious rooms and a large terrace make it an ideal place for family gatherings and outdoor enjoyment.
Home in harmony with nature, surrounded by a beautiful garden.
3 bedrooms (including a master suite), 2 bathrooms, 190 m², expansive garden with pond, outdoor seating areas, modern kitchen, large living room with panoramic windows, ideal for nature lovers.
Cottage with Fireplace

A cozy cottage featuring a fireplace and wooden finishes that create a warm atmosphere. Ideal for winter evenings and intimate gatherings with friends. Inside, you’ll find a modern kitchen and comfortable bedrooms for relaxation after an active day.
Cozy cottage with a fireplace and wooden finishes.
2 bedrooms (including a master suite), 1 bathroom, 120 m², wood-burning fireplace, modern kitchen with dining area, large windows for natural light, outdoor fire pit for gatherings.
Modern Loft

A stylish loft with an open layout and high ceilings, offering a unique combination of modern design and comfort. Perfect for young professionals and creative individuals who value space and light in their living environment.
Modern loft with an open layout and high ceilings.
1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, 90 m², high ceilings with exposed beams, modern kitchen, open living space, large windows with city views, ideal for urban living.
Traditional House
A traditional house with a cozy atmosphere and spacious rooms, offering comfort and style. Ideal for family living, with a separate kitchen and living room where you can spend quality time together.
Traditional house with a cozy atmosphere and spacious rooms.
3 bedrooms (including a guest room), 2 bathrooms, 160 m², family-friendly layout, large kitchen with dining area, backyard for children’s play, close to schools and parks.
Cottage by the Sea

A seaside cottage with stunning views and direct access to the beach. Perfect for those who want to enjoy the sea breeze and sunny days. Spacious rooms and a terrace for outdoor dining create ideal conditions for relaxation.
Seaside cottage with direct beach access.
4 bedrooms (including a master suite with balcony), 3 bathrooms, 240 m², beachfront access, large terrace for entertaining, fully equipped kitchen, outdoor shower, perfect for beach lovers.
